member.name: PROPDESC_SEARCHINFO_FLAGS
member.summary: Determines whether and how a property is indexed by Windows Search.

member.name: PROPDESC_SEARCHINFO_FLAGS.PDSIF_ININVERTEDINDEX
member.summary: The property is in an inverted index to help speed searches.

member.name: PROPDESC_SEARCHINFO_FLAGS.PDSIF_ISCOLUMN
member.summary: The property is indexed by Windows Search.

member.name: PROPDESC_SEARCHINFO_FLAGS.PDSIF_ISCOLUMNSPARSE
member.summary: The property is indexed to save space for properties that are not present on all files.

member.name: PROPDESC_SEARCHINFO_FLAGS.PDSIF_ALWAYSINCLUDE
member.summary: Windows 7 and later. The property mnemonics are recognized by AQS even if the property is not a column (PDSIF_ISCOLUMN).

member.name: PROPDESC_SEARCHINFO_FLAGS.PDSIF_USEFORTYPEAHEAD
member.summary: Check this property for matches when looking for type ahead results.
